content: प्रख्या {c2c} <ab>P.</ab> {@--1@} To report, announce declare. {@--2@} To praise, celebrate, {%--<ab>Pass.</ab>%} To be well-known or celebrated, be famous. {%--<ab>Caus.</ab>%} To celebrate proclaim, announce, declare publicly, publish.

प्रख्या {@--1@} Perceptibility, visibility {@--2@} Renown, fame, celebrity; न्यवसत्परमप्रख्यः संप्रत्येब पुरीमिमां <ls>Rām.</ls> {@--3@} Disclosure. {@--4@} Resemblance, similitude (in <ab>comp.</ab>); <ls>Y. 3. 10.</ls> {@--5@} Look, appearance.
